entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
